sentences.en: Boxing is a test of skill and technique, rather than brute strength.
sentences.cn: 拳击考验的是技能和技术，不是蛮力。

sentences.en: He acted the part with consummate skill.
sentences.cn: 他以精湛的演技饰演了这一角色。

sentences.en: He was magnanimous in defeat and praised his opponent's skill.
sentences.cn: 他对失败表现得很洒脱，并且赞扬了对手的才能。
他的政治手腕高超是出了名的。

sentences.en: I regard creativity both as a gift and as a skill.
sentences.cn: 我认为创造力既是一种天赋也是一种技巧。

sentences.en: It takes great skill, cool nerves and the reflexes of an athlete.
sentences.cn: 那需要运动员有高超的技巧、冷静的头脑和迅速的反应能力。

sentences.en: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.cn: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

sentences.en: My skill in such matters might redound to my advantage.
sentences.cn: 我在这种事情上的技能可能会对我有所帮助。

sentences.en: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.cn: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.en: She almost died, but the hospital's skill achieved great marvels.
sentences.cn: 她已经奄奄一息，但是医院的技术却创造了伟大的奇迹。

sentences.en: The crucial skill you need to develop is sorting out the parents.
sentences.cn: 你需要培养的关键技能就是让那些家长认错。

sentences.en: The cut of a diamond depends on the skill of its craftsman.
sentences.cn: 钻石切割靠的是工匠的技艺。

sentences.en: The difficult operation will exact all the doctor's skill.
sentences.cn: 这困难的手术将需要这位医生拿出全部本领来.

sentences.en: The job requires skill and an eye for detail.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要技巧和注意细节的眼光。

sentences.en: The new model is a testament to the skill and dedication of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 这种新型产品显示了全体员工的技术水平和敬业精神。

sentences.en: They cooked without skill and ate without discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他们烹调手艺不高，也不挑食。

sentences.en: To forge a blade takes great skill.
sentences.cn: 锻造刀刃需要很高超的技巧。

words.tran_cn: （英）熟练的；灵巧的；技术好的（等于skillful）
熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的

phrases.tran_cn: 人际关系技巧，人际交往能力
语言技能，语言能力；语言技巧
领导技巧；领导技能；领导艺术
n. 演讲技巧；表达技巧
社会技能；社交能力；社交技能
写作技巧；书写技能；笔头

trans.tran_en: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it
